website_summaries.verdict: A compact portable campfire that is ideal for camping trips where you want a safe, smoke-free fire.
pros: It’s small, easy to transport, and comes with a sturdy latching lid and an 8' hose for the propane tank
Uses standard, refillable propane tanks so it can be used over and over
cons: Doesn't put out as much heat as the larger portable fires and the decorative logs are flimsy and easily broken

customer_reviews.title: Buy one from campfire in a can instead if you don't want to listen to a bunch of hissing.
customer_reviews.text: The campco has one fatal flaw. It makes a loud hissing sound which completely ruins the ambience of having a fire. I can't believe the company hasn't fixed this. To fix it yourself you have to buy a new elbow that doesn't have the pre-drilled holes in it. Supposedly these holes are supposed to allow you to adjust the color of the flames. I tried to use the adjuster and it's pretty useless and has a tiny screw that no screwdriver seems to fit, I had to use a vice grips. There are two other manufacturers that may not have these problems. When is called campfire in a can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Fire
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little propane fire pit. It puts out good heat and a decent flame. I just wish that they could figure out a way to make it quieter when you turn the flame high. And, it can go through a propane tank (large) pretty fast on high for a long time. However, I used mine for a couple of weeks at various levels for a couple of hours each night before my tank was empty.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: super loud
customer_reviews.text: product ii feel is quality but it was loud enough i packaged it back up and sent it back. Have had the camp chef fire pit before and it was sweet!! I bought another one and love it

customer_reviews.text: A Most wondrous and perfect size for the camp out. I love to be able to cook on top of it. Expensive but well worth it if limited in packing.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable campfire
customer_reviews.text: We have a campfire ban in our area. This is the only legal way to enjoy this favorite part of camping!!! Love love ours!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: Portable Campfire
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent when you get to a campsite and there is a campfire ban.
customer_reviews.author: G wells

customer_reviews.title: Great little campfire...!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine almost 2 years ago... for $120.00 here in amazon. Surprised to see the price has increased... It's been awesome. No more smoke of trying to start a fire under the rain.... or having to buy those over priced bundles of fire wood at the store. It's great to have an instant fire at night, and or early mornings with a cup of coffee... we do s'mores and cook sausages on a stick and a cold IPA... doesn't get better that that.... it has come great when you go into campfire restrictions areas..... Haven't had any issues with it, even when doing washboard roads off of the beaten path...
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Logs blacken with soot very badly. Also super noisy as it only has two small air holes on the bottom for combustion air. I’ve seen other models which the whole bottom pan has holes in it to allow better, quieter air flow. It has a hiss that gets louder as your turn up the flames. Flame and heat output however is pretty decent for a fire pit this size.
customer_reviews.author: SLA

customer_reviews.title: Great portable fire
customer_reviews.text: Friends brought this camping, best little portable fire pit. Compact, easy set up/pack up. Will be purchasing one for our next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

product_meta.title: Camco 58031 "Little Red Campfire" Portable Propane Camp Fire --P#EWT43 65234R3FA66413
product_meta.description: Camco's Little Red Campfire lets you take your fire with you. It is great for campsites with restrictions against in-ground fires. Take it tailgating or put it on the patio, the size is convenient for wherever you need a fire. The realistic log set and full 9.5" diameter ring burner help create the natural look and ambiance of from-scratch campfires. The sturdy lid and security latches make it safe and easy for transport. An 8' propane hose for use with standard LP gas cylinders is included. It also includes an adjustable regulator with a maximum output of 65,000 BTU/HR.
